author: Staff Reporter
text: A senior citizen died on the spot when he was hit by a tipper lorry on Thursday. Dharma (85), a resident of Gangai Amman Nagar, was walking near the Alapakkam signal when a tipper lorry hit him. The driver, Balan (32), has been remanded by the Poonamallee traffic police.
title: Elderly man run over by lorry
